mapper.select: select a.baby_name,b.diag_time ,d.dis_code,d.dis_name,d.dis_price,b.resv_no from baby a,diagnosis b,reservation c ,DISEASE d a.baby_no=c.baby_no and b.resv_no=c.resv_no and b.dis_code=d.dis_code and a.baby_no=#{baby_no} order by b.diag_time DESC

select e.emp_name, b.baby_name,b.BABY_REGNO1,b.BABY_REGNO2,p.parent_name,p.parent_addr, de.dis_name from DIAGNOSIS d, RESERVATION r, EMPLOYEE e, BABY b, PARENT p, disease DE,PRESCRIPTION f where d.resv_no = r.resv_no and d.emp_no = e.emp_no and r.baby_no = b.baby_no and b.parent_no = p.parent_no and d.dis_code = de.dis_code and d.resv_no = #{resv_no}
